name: WorldGate
description:
A Ludum Dare 30 Jam Game ("Connected Worlds"). Created in August 2014 by runvs.

WorldGate WG-1 is a tactical strategy game. You lead and train a team of up to three soldiers, scientists or defenders. The team discovers new worlds, alien animals and strange artifacts. Between missions you can train your soldiers with the money you earned, while still taking care of fixed costs.

We offer a two song soundtrack and 5 levels of different gameplay.

The game is played with mouse and is available for Linux, Windows, Mac and Web. For Web you will need the Unity webplayer (get it here http://unity3d.com/webplayer). Since WorldGate WG-1 was created with Unity 4.6 Beta, problems may occur with the Web version. Sorry for the inconvenience, please consider trying the download version.

We use the Mockup font which is released under SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
